value.title: Azure SignalR Service | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Xiaokai He joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure SignalR Service. See how easy it is to start building your real-time web application without setting up your own SignalR server. value.title: Best way to start Power Apps for a non-professional developer? | One Dev Question: Dona Sarkar
value.excerpt: Sometimes services like Power Apps can be daunting. In the One Dev Question series, Principal Cloud Advocate Dona Sarkar shares some tips for getting started and explains why you do not have to be a professional developer to use Power Apps.   For more information, visit: https://docs.microsoft.com/learn/modules/get-started-with-powerapps/?WT.mc_id=onedevquestion-c9-donasa

value.title: Bring compute, storage, and intelligence to the edge with Azure Stack Edge | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Dipti Pai joins Scott Hanselman to show how to run containerized and VM workloads to get quick, actionable insights at the edge—where data is created—using purpose-built hardware-as-a-service with Azure Stack Edge.  0:00 – Overview 0:55 – What is Azure Stack Edge? 4:09 – Azure Stack Edge in the house

value.title: Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM) with Azure Security Center | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure Security Center enables you to strengthen your security posture. value.title: Code to Cloud with Docker and Azure Container Instances | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Chad Metcalf from Docker joins Scott Hanselman to show how to use the Docker CLI to deploy a container to Azure Container Instances (ACI). Using only the Docker CLI, Chad deploys a Minecraft image to ACI and then shares the public IP address with Scott so he can join in the wacky, blocky world!  ACI
